hero.title: PARDON
hero.subtitle: Official Return to the Network
hero.description: pardon was created in December 2024 by a person like hiwoshi, but then the project was closed. We are announcing its official return to the network.

info.title: About Pardon
info.description: pardon was created in December 2024 by a person like hiwoshi, but then the project was closed. We are announcing its official return to the network.

godkm.name: godkm
godkm.description: Also known as hiwoshi. Founder of the Pardon project, has been an owner since 2024. Experienced OSINT specialist within and beyond Telegram, active community participant.

kotik.name: KOTIK
kotik.description: Programmer with experience in C++, Python, JavaScript and other languages. Developer and technical specialist of the project.

akashi.name: akashi spider
akashi.description: Promising character of pardon, gained fame in 2025 through channels and frequent targets/gism. In January 2026, will start working on pardon at full capacity together with hiwoshi and kotik.

dave.name: spider dave
dave.description: Active participant of pardon who actively helps in its work and development. Student of hiwoshi.

durka.name: durka
durka.description: Active project participant contributing to the development and support of the Pardon community.

footer.text: Â© 2025 Pardon. Official return to the network.
